byline.original: By Susan Heller Anderson and David W. Dunlap

docs.lead_paragraph: Max Weinberg, Bruce Springsteen's drummer, talked about his hands. The dancers Violette Verdi and Arthur Mitchell talked about their legs. Walter Charles, co-star of ''La Cage aux Folles,'' talked about his vocal cords.
